org.pepstock.charba.client.utils.toast

Class ToastOptionsBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pepstock.charba.client.utils.toast.ToastOptionsBuilder

  • public final class ToastOptionsBuilder
extends Object
    Comfortable object to create Toaster options by a builder.
    Author:
    Andrea "Stock" Stocchero

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ToastOptions build()
      Returns a configured toast options.
      static ToastOptionsBuilder create()
      Returns new builder instance.
      static ToastOptionsBuilder create(String title)
      Returns new builder instance, setting the title to the toast options.
      static ToastOptionsBuilder create(String title, String text)
      Returns new builder instance, setting the text and text to the toast options.
      static ToastOptionsBuilder create(String title, String text, ToastType type)
      Returns new builder instance, setting the text, text and type to the toast options.
      static ToastOptionsBuilder create(String title, ToastType type)
      Returns new builder instance, setting the title and type to the toast options.
      ToastOptionsBuilder setAutoHide(boolean hide)
      Sets whether to make the toast notification sticky, which means that the toast notification will never auto dismiss until clicked.
      ToastOptionsBuilder setClickEventHandler(ClickEventHandler clickEventHandler)
      Sets the CLICK event hander.
      ToastOptionsBuilder setCloseEventHandler(CloseEventHandler closeEventHandler)
      Sets the CLOSE event hander.
      ToastOptionsBuilder setHideProgressBar(boolean hide)
      Sets true whether to hide the progress bar.
      ToastOptionsBuilder setOpenEventHandler(OpenEventHandler openEventHandler)
      Sets the OPEN event hander.
      ToastOptionsBuilder setProgressBarType(ProgressBarType type)
      Sets the type of the toast progress bar.
      ToastOptionsBuilder setText(String text)
      Sets the text of the toast.
      ToastOptionsBuilder setTimeout(int timeout)
      Sets how long the toast notification should last.
      ToastOptionsBuilder setTitle(String title)
      Sets the title of the toast.
      ToastOptionsBuilder setType(ToastType type)
      Sets the type of the toast.
      void show()
      Shows the configured toast.
